string-array.name: descriptionRegularDishes
string-array.item: Delicious meatloaf. This meatloaf is filled with whitebread and spicy saus. Needed for this recipe are: - Meat - Whitebread - Spicy saus - Butter - Tomato saus
Handy and easy made italian spagetti. Needed for this recipe are: - Wheat spagetti - Tomatos - Basel - Cheese - Meat
Chinese beef noodle. For this recipe you need the following ingrediënts: - Mi noodle - Carrots - Beef - Vegetables
Quik and fast delicious cheese lasagne. Needed ingrediënts for this recipe are: - Lasagne leaves - Meat - Cheddar cheese - Blue cheese - Tomatos
Family size paella. for this recipe you need the following ingrediënts: - Shripms - Yellow rice - Basel - Peas
Spicy indian beef noodle. For this quik and easy recipe you need the following: - Mi noodle - Beef - Spicy saus - Vegetables
